column1: 東京都統計年鑑（平成31年・令和元年）TOKYO STATISTICAL YEARBOOK ( 2019 ) 20  司法・警察・消防 20  JUSTICE， POLICE， AND FIRE FIGHTING SERVICES
20-9  少年保護事件 (2)  行為別人員 （平成29～平成31･令和元年） 20-9  JUVENILE PROTECTION CASES (2)  JUVENILES BY OFFENSE ( 2017-2019 )
この表は，東京家庭裁判所本庁分のみである。
This table relates only to the cases handled by the headquarters of the Tokyo Family Court.

a) Receipt of stolen property， etc. b) Bodily injury or death through bodily injury c) Professional negligence resulting in death or bodily injury d) Obstruction of official duties e) Negligence in driving resulting in death or bodily injury f) Crimes other than penal offenses g) Immigration Control and Refugees Recognition Act h) Poisonous and deleterious substances
注 1)  刑法の一部が改正（平成29年7月13日施行）され，強姦の罪名，構成要件等が改められたことに伴い，「強姦」を「強制性交等」に変更した。

Note: 1)  "Rape" has been changed to "Forced sexual intercourse， etc." following the partial amendment of the Penal Code (enforced on July 13， 2017)， which revised the crime name and elements， etc. of rape.
資料：東京家庭裁判所事務局総務課 Source: Tokyo Family Court
